thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 9 of 3524
thread.title: Jenn

author: Jenn
title: Jenn
text: I love Thriftbooks, but was a bit disappointed to end up with an uncorrected proof version of a book I ordered a few weeks ago. I chose a used version of the book, but didn't see it indicated that it was actually a proof. I'm sure it will be fine to read still, but wish the site had indicated that it was only a proof and not a published copy of the book when I was ordering.
